amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to eliminate funding for the Department of Treasury's Community Development Financial Institutions Fund.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the Department of the Treasury's Community Development Financial Institutions Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 306 (Roll no. 624).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 306 (Roll no. 624).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
